pierce.description: Determines if the raycast pierces through entities.
pierce.markdownDescription: Determines if the raycast pierces through entities.

particle.description: If set, the particle effect that is displayed on the ray.
particle.markdownDescription: If set, the particle effect that is displayed on the ray.

spacing.description: If there is a particle effect, the spacing between the particles displayed on the ray.
spacing.markdownDescription: If there is a particle effect, the spacing between the particles displayed on the ray.

block_action.description: If set, the block action to be executed on the block the player has targeted.
block_action.markdownDescription: If set, the block action to be executed on the block the player has targeted.

block_condition.description: If set, the block condition that must be met by the entity the player is targeting in order to do actions.
block_condition.markdownDescription: If set, the block condition that must be met by the entity the player is targeting in order to do actions.

bientity_action.description: If set, the bi-entity action(s) to be executed on the entities that have been targeted with the entity that initiated the raycast as the actor and each individual entity targeted by the raycast as the target.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: If set, the bi-entity action(s) to be executed on the entities that have been targeted with the entity that initiated the raycast as the actor and each individual entity targeted by the raycast as the target.

bientity_condition.description: If set, the bi-entity condition(s) that must be met by the entity that initiated the raycast as the actor and each individual entity targeted by the raycast as the target.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If set, the bi-entity condition(s) that must be met by the entity that initiated the raycast as the actor and each individual entity targeted by the raycast as the target.

target_action.description: If set, the action(s) to be executed on the entities the player has targeted.
target_action.markdownDescription: If set, the action(s) to be executed on the entities the player has targeted.

target_condition.description: If set, the condition(s) that must be met by each individual entity the player is targeting in order to do actions.
target_condition.markdownDescription: If set, the condition(s) that must be met by each individual entity the player is targeting in order to do actions.

self_action.description: If set, the action(s) to be executed on the entity that initiated the raycast upon successfully raycasting.
self_action.markdownDescription: If set, the action(s) to be executed on the entity that initiated the raycast upon successfully raycasting.

direction.description: If specified, the direction in which the raycast will travel in.
direction.markdownDescription: If specified, the direction in which the raycast will travel in.

space.description: If `direction` is specified, the [Space](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/misc/extras/space/) to perform the raycast in.
space.markdownDescription: If `direction` is specified, the [Space](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/misc/extras/space/) to perform the raycast in.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](../entity_action_types.md).

An entity action that raycasts from an entity and performs actions based on what's specified.

Type ID: `apugli:raycast`

!!! note

    If the `distance` field is not set, the distance of the raycast will be dependent on the entity's reach and attack range for blocks and entities respectively.

    Reach defaults to 5.0 in creative mode and 4.5 outside of creative mode.
    Attack Range defaults to 6.0 in creative mode and 3.0 outside of creative mode.

    Any attribute modifiers from Reach Entity Attributes are applied to these initial values.
type.markdownDescription:
[Entity Action Type](../entity_action_types.md).

An entity action that raycasts from an entity and performs actions based on what's specified.

Type ID: `apugli:raycast`

!!! note

    If the `distance` field is not set, the distance of the raycast will be dependent on the entity's reach and attack range for blocks and entities respectively.

    Reach defaults to 5.0 in creative mode and 4.5 outside of creative mode.
    Attack Range defaults to 6.0 in creative mode and 3.0 outside of creative mode.

    Any attribute modifiers from Reach Entity Attributes are applied to these initial values.
